contextId.occurrenceNote: This was an act of worship. (See: [[rc://en/ta/man/translate/translate-symaction]])
contextId.glQuote: Joshua lay facedown on the ground to worship

contextId.occurrenceNote: This was an act of reverence. (See: [[rc://en/ta/man/translate/translate-symaction]])
contextId.glQuote: Take off your sandals from your feet

contextId.occurrenceNote: They did these things to show God how sad and distressed they were. (See: [[rc://en/ta/man/translate/translate-symaction]])
contextId.glQuote: tore his garments ... put dust on their heads and lay facedown on the ground in front of the ark of Yahweh
